If the returned type is a SKU or default.description: Result object having SKU related information.

complexPrice.description: The complex price of the sku.

levels.description: Price levels of the Complex price.

price.description: The price associated with this level.

levelMinimum.description: The minimum quantity associated with this level.

levelMaximum.description: The maximum quantity associated with this level.

salePrice.description: The sale price of the SKU.

listPrice.description: The list price of the SKU.
